ScrapBook - Class in org.sm.smtools.scrapbook
 
ScrapBook() - Constructor for class org.sm.smtools.scrapbook.ScrapBook
 
searchArrayBounds(double[], double) - Static method in class org.sm.smtools.math.MathTools
Determines the indices of the 2 values surrounding the searched value in an array of x.length elements, such that: x[fLowerBound] ≤ xSearch < x[fUpperBound] There are 2 special cases: xSearch < min(x) leads to fLowerBound = fUpperBound = 0 xSearch ≥ max(x) leads to fLowerBound = fUpperBound = x.length - 1 Note that this method assumes that the elements in x are sorted!
sec() - Method in class org.sm.smtools.math.complex.ComplexNumber
